name: Cakespy: Crumb Cake Shake
description: Combining two of the world's most perfect foods—crumb cake and ice cream, mixed with a dash of cream for good measure—this shake is an absolute dream, especially when served with a crumb cake wedge as garnish. The inspiration for this shake comes from a coffee cake shake known as the "Mother Futcher" from Tradewinds Cafe of Portland, Maine.
recipeIngredient: 2 large scoops ice cream (I used caramel butter pecan)
Extra wedge crumb cake, for garnish (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Place crumb cake slice, ice cream, and heavy cream in blender. Blend on high until smooth, 10 to 20 seconds. Add more cream or milk if thinner shake is desired; add more ice cream if you'd like a thicker shake.
Pour into tall glass to serve. If desired, garnish with an extra wedge of crumb cake on rim of glass.
